name: trailing-slash
description: E2E Tests for trailingSlash config option
author: LekoArts

scripts.test:option:develop: cross-env-shell OPTION=$OPTION start-server-and-test develop:option http://localhost:8000 cy:develop:option

scripts.test:ignore: cross-env OPTION=ignore npm run build:option && cross-env OPTION=ignore npm run test:option:build && cross-env OPTION=ignore npm run test:option:develop
